title: No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When working in the Photon version of the java editor, the expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler. This menu should allow the user to add breakpoints or marks. However, currently, the popup menu does not appear as expected.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., does not appear as expected.
EB: The expected behavior is that when I right click on the left vertical ruler in a java editor, a popup menu should appear that allows me to add breakpoints or marks.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc., should appear as expected.
